nodes.text: Jason was an individual who, at one point during or prior to the Clone Wars, had received a pin-up of a female Rodian. The message was written in Aurebesh, and was displayed in the top-right corner of the picture.

This decorative poster first appears in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Lethal Trackdown," where it is seen from far away; the Aurebesh caption is almost illegible. The poster is first seen in close-up in a cantina in "Pursuit of Peace."
